description: MultiTools is a privacy-first, browser-based media and productivity suite that integrates Google Gemini for transcription, OCR, image analysis, and multi-personality TTS. Built with React + TypeScript and Tailwind, it stores files locally and scopes user data per account. Targeted at journalists, students, and professionals who need powerful, offline-first media tooling without subscription lock-ins.
features: AI Transcription with speaker diarization and exports (SRT, DOCX, PDF, JSON)
Batch image OCR with translation and pacing engine
privacy: No cloud storage by default; data stored locally and scoped per-user. No analytics or tracking.
